title: Als Gourmet Falafel and Fries Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mobile food cart with 90% vegetarian/vegan menu and gluten free choices. Vegans try the cooked to order falafel made with organic chickpeas served with in-house-made hummus, lettuce, tomato, cucumber, in-house-made pickles, marinated eggplant and creamy vegan tahini sauce served in a pita or in a bowl (GF). Also vegan are fries, vegan gravy, hummus, pita, veggies, potato or yam fries.
